plot: Brian, another youngster hit by the storm, develops the power to control dairy products, and, to impress a would-be girlfriend, goes public with his special ability, being known as Milkman. This leads the misfits - despite reluctance from Simon - to also go public and, with a manager Laura to promote them, they become famous as the Asbo Five. Pushed onto the side-lines Milkman becomes murderously resentful and takes to killing innocent by-standers as well as setting a trap to put paid to his celebrity rivals. Curtis will have to bring his special powers into play to save his friends and return things to normal.—don @ minifie-1
